title: Crescendo
description:
Ok, here is Crescendo as I promised. Aside from the bug at installation that causes it to appear in Japanese, however there is a TXT along to help which I also copied and pasted here. No big deal thu, the game is in english and works.
-----------------------------------------------------------

This game appears to be in Japanese when you install it, but once you start it, it&#039;s in English. Just choose the topmost choise on the autorun menu to start the installer.
-----------------------------------------------------------
